Package com.mySTARS.Entities

Class Lesson

java.lang.Object
com.mySTARS.Entities.Lesson
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Lesson
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Course class holds the methods that handle implementation of code related to the lessons.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Lesson

      public Lesson​(DAY day, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String group, java.lang.String location, WEEK lessonWeeks, java.lang.String remarks, java.lang.String startTime, java.lang.String endTime)
      Constructor for making a course. Takes in the basic details of a course and returns a valid Course object
      Parameters:
      day - Day of the week that the lesson is held
      type - Type of lesson - lecture, tutorial or lab
      group - Group code / name of that lesson
      location - Location that lesson is held at
      lessonWeeks - Weeks that lesson is held - odd , even or both
      remarks - To hold additional comments that admin wishes to add for that particular lesson
      startTime - Start time of the lesson slot
      endTime - End time of the lesson slot
